title: Mad at Disney
lyrics: tone I'm mad at Disney, Disney They tricked me, tricked me Had me wishing on a shooting star But now I'm twenty something I still know nothing About who I am or what I'm not So call me a pessimist But I don't believe in Finding a true love's kiss is bullshit I felt sad love I felt bad love Sometimes happy love Turns into giving up I felt hurt love About the word love What the hell is love, what the hell is love What the hell is love supposed to feel like My fairy grandma warned me Cinderella's story Only ended in a bad divorce The prince ain't sleeping when he Take his sleeping beauty To the motel on his snow white horse So call me a pessimist But I don't believe in Finding a true love's kiss is bullshit I felt sad love I felt bad love Sometimes happy love Turns into giving up I felt hurt love About the word love What the hell is love supposed to feel like What the hell is love, what the hell is love What the hell is love supposed to feel like What the hell is love, what the hell is love What the hell is love supposed to feel like  They tricked me, tricked me No more wishing on a shooting star
